company_context: #1 B2B Leads Database for sales lead generation. Free Trial (50 Free B2B Leads) Product Tour Contact Us Login Add Listing Select Page The only Unlimited B2B Leads Database for sales lead generation. Get a Real-Time B2B Lead Generation Database Now with Sales Intelligence Intent – Try it Free . Lead411 Offers: Competitive Pricing with Subscriptions Starting at just $49 / Month! Identify and Connect with Decision-Makers using Verified Data Extensive Company Data with Technographics Actionable Sales Intelligence with B2B Intent Data White-labeled B2B Data for Resellers Discover warmer b2b leads, build stronger business relationships and close more deals with Lead411. Schedule A Quick Product Tour of Lead411 Add Lead411 along with other great Tools in our Sales Tool Directory… Get Started For Free! Don’t just take our word for it. G2 lists Lead411 as #1 in their list of top Zoominfo competitors and Apollo.io competitors . Try before you buy with a 7-day free trial with the ability to try up to 50 B2B direct-dial mobile phone numbers or verified Email Addresses. You can experience the power and ease of Lead411’s b2b lead generation with our extensive b2b email database. (*96% deliverability average is by non-spam messaging/subject lines and only for optimized verified emails) Get 50 Free B2B Leads All-in-One B2B Lead Intelligence Platform Lead411 is a powerful B2B lead generation database and sales intelligence platform that helps sales teams, marketers, and business development professionals reach the right decision-makers faster. With real-time verified contact data , growth intent signals, and seamless CRM integrations, Lead411 makes it easy to build pipelines, close deals, and scale outreach efforts efficiently. What Lead411 Offers: B2B Lead Generation : Access millions of verified emails, direct dials, and company profiles to fuel your outreach strategy. Sales Intelligence Alerts : Stay ahead of the competition with real-time notifications for hiring, funding, executive changes, and company growth signals. Growth Intent Data : Pinpoint companies that are actively growing or in buying mode using behavioral indicators and industry-specific trends. Sales Intelligence API : Seamlessly connect the best sales lead database into your platform, CRM, or application with our developer-friendly API. Unlimited Search Plans : Unlike other providers, Lead411 offers truly unlimited search and export capabilities on select plans—no daily caps or usage limits. CRM & Outreach Integration : Sync directly with Salesforce, HubSpot, Outreach.io, and more for frictionless prospecting and lead management. Advanced Search Filters : Drill down by industry, company size, technologies used, location, job title, and more—get hyper-targeted results in seconds. Why Choose Lead411? Thousands of companies—from fast-growing startups to Fortune 500 teams—use Lead411 to accelerate revenue growth , shorten sales cycles , and boost outbound performance . conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours streamline their data management and gain valuable insights. I came across your company, Lead411, and was impressed with the work you're doing in the B2B lead generation space. Can you tell me a bit about your current data processing setup?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Ah, yeah. We're currently using a combination of in-house tools and some third-party services to manage our data. But to be honest, we're pretty happy with what we have right now. What makes you think we need something like DeepData AI?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Well, from what I've seen, Lead411 is handling a massive amount of data, and I think our solution could help you optimize your data processing, reduce costs, and improve your sales team's efficiency. We've had success with similar companies in the past, and I'd love to discuss how we can help you achieve your goals.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the offer, but we're in the middle of a big project right now, and I'm not sure we have the bandwidth to take on a new solution. Plus, I'm not sure if our budget would accommodate it. What kind of pricing are we talking about?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Our pricing is competitive, starting at $5,000 per month for our basic package. However, I think our premium package, which includes advanced features and dedicated support, would be a better fit for a company like yours. That would be $10,000 per month.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: That's a bit steep for us, to be honest. We're already invested in our current setup, and I'm not sure if the ROI would be there for us. We've also been looking into some other solutions, like Zoominfo and Apollo.io, which seem to be more established in the market.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand your concerns, but I think DeepData AI can offer more customized solutions and better support than our competitors. I'd be happy to set up a demo to show you what we can do and answer any questions you may have.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the offer, Alex, but like I said, we're pretty busy right now. Why don't you just send me an email with some more information, and we can revisit this conversation in a few months? I'm afraid we won't be moving forward with DeepData AI at this time.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Price
Feedback: The seller should have been more prepared to address the buyer's pricing concerns and potentially offered a more flexible or customized pricing plan to better fit the buyer's budget and needs. Sentiment: Neutral
